caption.p: Effect of essential oils from Nectandra amazonum, N. gardneri, N. hihua and N. megapotamica on NO production by peritoneal macrophages infected with Leishmania amazonensis (a) and L. infantum (b) amastigotes. Bars represent the mean ± SD of six replicates. * p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01, *** p < 0.001 for the different concentrations versus untreated cells (control) (Student’s t test). The data are representative of three independent experiments.
